BR_text.BRsummary: [Dashboard] Some GPUs have gpu_utilization=null, breaking page
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
 
 Ray version and other system information (Python version, TensorFlow version, OS):
 1.0.0 release.
 <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
 
 Please provide a script that can be run to reproduce the issue. The script should have no external library dependencies (i.e., use fake or mock data / environments):
 If we cannot run your script, we cannot fix your issue.
 This issue was reported by Pieterjan, and I believe it doesn't need reproduction, only to properly handle the case where that data is missing with something like an . I hadn't realized that that field was optional from the gpustat library.
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3156716/95609266-70aa9b80-0a2c-11eb-994f-e01e1bb66332.png></denchmark-link>
 
 
  I have verified my script runs in a clean environment and reproduces the issue.
  I have verified the issue also occurs with the latest wheels.

comments_0.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mfitton>@mfitton</denchmark-link>
  I made it P0. Please feel free to change the priority if it doesn't look right to you!
